page.title: 14THE LOCAL POLICEMAN
page.content: P.C. Pickering is the local policeman. He came to the school and told us about the crime in Barling. In 1984 and 1985 there have been two burglaries and one car stolen. He thinks that teenagers cause the most trouble by writing on walls and annoying people. Motorbikes,horses and dogs are also a nuisance. In two years one child has been injured on the roads. P.C. Pickering patrols the village and visits the local schools. He keeps in touch with the station by radio. He travels by car or bike.
